name: Avehi Public Charitable (Educational)Trust

address: Behind New Shirin Talkies, Saat Rasta, Mahalaxmi

briefDescription: Avehi means ‘to know’. The Avehi Public Charitable (Educational) Trust APC(E)T founded in 1981 is a media resource centre supporting schools, community organizations, women’s and environmental groups by providing media resources and intervening in formal education to enrich their work for widening horizons, for raising the level of education and awareness, promoting values of equality, justice, gender parity, secularism, environmental sustainability.  Avehi founded the Abacus Project in 1990 to make school education more relevant, enjoyable and qualitatively enhanced particularly in the realm of public education. Avehi initiated the Avehi Abacus Project in 1990. The Avehi Abacus Project (AAP) believes in improving and strengthening the public education system to reach out to the marginalized sections of society and to impact mainstream policy on education.

address: Raoli Camp, S.M.Road, Sardar Nagar NO.4,
